translation:
Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Domingos José de Almeida. Pelotas, June 2, 1843.

With great satisfaction I received a letter from Your Excellency containing ten patacões, which I send by the bearer of this, who is Mr. Teixeira, and since you have opened this way for me, I have to ask the favor, if out of respect for Your Excellency Your Excellency

From Your Excellency João Antônio de Oliveira Aguiar.

Answered on June 29, 1843.

Most Illustrious and Excellent Sir Piratini.
